levels.description: Passive Effect: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>; Active Effect: Marks the target and makes them easier to be targeted by allies. The mark explodes after <@ba.vup>{paper_duration}</> seconds, dealing <@ba.vup>{default_atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage to nearby enemies. Every hit on the marked target by allies increases the explosion damage by <@ba.vup>{factor_atk_scale:0%}</> of Lee's ATK (increases up to <@ba.vup>{max_stack_cnt}</> times, and prematurely explodes if the limit is reached or the target is defeated)
